explanation: [0-0] On a cement floor, a little boy in a yellow short-sleeved shirt and blue shorts sits barefoot on a small red stool with a pair of blue star-patterned shoes in front of him. Behind him are some green plants. In the upper left corner, there is a colorful logo that reads "BiBoBon SHORTS".

[0-6] First, the little boy in the yellow shirt looks up, waves, opens his mouth wide and says something. A man in a blue short-sleeved shirt, red shorts, and green shoes squats down to his left and starts putting the shoes on the boy. After putting on the shoes, they look at each other and give a thumbs-up gesture together.
